content: Funny how Republicans can block registered voters from voting because the voters in question are the wrong skin color, and can allow a hostile country to tamper with our election results, yet still claim that those who voted against their “golden boy” committed fraud. And the sad part is that nobody outside a few independent and left-wing sources even bats an eye at all of this, yet faithfully reports Fuhrer Trump’s lie about voter fraud and calls him out on it? Stick the finger in the crack in the dam and call it fixed, why don’t we?
